definition: used in the transliteration of people's names
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Dr. Halsey held up a hand , indicating that he halt.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾茜博士舉起一隻手，示意他停一下。

sentences.english: Of course Celia will have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 當然茜莉婭會照管孩子們。

sentences.english: Bought her and her little wench, Prissy.
sentences.chinese: 買了她和她的小女兒百里茜。

sentences.english: Rose is reading Russian in a bright room.
sentences.chinese: 羅茜在一個明亮的房間裏讀俄文。
你就是這兒的主攻隊員，凱爾茜。

sentences.english: I will provide ur login details if ure selected.
sentences.chinese: 我將提供烏爾登錄細節，如果茜選中。

sentences.english: Then Francy felt pain at the side of her head where the tree had hit her.
sentences.chinese: 接着，法蘭茜感到頭的一側很疼，那裏剛被樹砸到了。

sentences.english: In the same manner that Heather and Rachel had been left just sitting there?
sentences.chinese: 就像剛纔讓茜絲和蕾切爾坐在那兒似的？

sentences.english: Dr. Halsey felt a curious mix of revulsion and maternalism .
sentences.chinese: 哈爾茜博士有一種混合着反感和溺愛的奇怪感覺。

sentences.english: Lana said she would bring some drinks and snacks to Murcia's house.
sentences.chinese: 拉娜說她要帶一些飲料和小喫到瑪茜婭的住所。

sentences.english: And you're going to ask Dr. Halsey to lend you one ?
sentences.chinese: 你是想問哈爾茜博士借一個了？

sentences.english: Alan and Lucy eloped against Lucy' s parents' wishes last week.
sentences.chinese: 愛倫和羅茜違抗羅茜父母的願望上星期私奔了。

sentences.english: Rosie began her model training during school days.
sentences.chinese: 羅茜在學生時代開始模特訓練。

sentences.english: Do you by any chance know two chicks named Rachel and Heather?
sentences.chinese: 你認不認識叫蕾切爾和茜絲的兩個女孩？

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
(onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑)/tinkling of gem-pendants
